DOC.brief_summary: Study of an investigational medication for the treatment of Alzheimer's Disease in patients who are not taking Aricept, Reminyl, Exelon.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of LY451395 in Patients With Probable Alzheimer's Disease
DOC.criteria: Must have a clinical diagnosis of Alzheimer's Disease Must be at least 50 years of age Must fluently read and speak English Must have a reliable caregiver Has serious health problems other than Alzheimer's Disease Cannot swallow whole pills Has had a menstrual period in the last two years Takes insulin for diabetes Has taken Aricept, Reminyl, or Exelon in the last 5 weeks
